settings.text: 1 day for Bengaluru (If order is booked before 10 am), 2 days for all metros  and 3 days for other cities

Every 5 ml of the Syrup contains:

Tulsi, (Ocimum sanctum), Lf, 86 mg; Sunthi, (Zingiber officinale), Rz, 43 mg;Adulsa/Vasa, (Justicia adhatoda), Lf, 69 mg ;Mulethi/Licorice, (Glycyrrhiza glabra), Rt, 52 mg;Bhumi amla, (Phyllanthus niruri), WP, 43 mg; Vacha/Sweet flag, (Acorus calamus), Rt, 3 mg; Ashwagandha, (Withania somnifera), Rt, 69 mg; Talispatra, (Abies webbiana), Lf, 43 mg; Mutha/Nut grass, (Cyperus rotundus), Rt, 43 mg;Rudravanti, (Cressa cretica), WP, 34 mg;Pippali, (Piper longum), Fr, 34 mg; Saunf, (Foeniculum vulgare), Fr, 34 mg; Spanish Thyme, (Coleus aromaticus), Lf, 17 mg; Menthol, (Pudina), Lf, 2 mg; Honey, 2000 mg; Excipients & Preservatives: Carboxymethyl Cellulose, Glycerine, and Sodium Benzoate.

Clear Vapor Patch Ultra contains:

  • Satva Pudina (Menthol) 6%
  • Kapoor (Camphor) 3%
  • Eucalyptus Oil 1%
  • Yavani Satva (Thymol) 1%

Bibo Saline Nasal Spray:

  • Tulsi, Ocimum Sanctum, Leaves, 2.00%
  • Saline, Lavana, Salt, 0.65%
  • Excipients: Xylitol, 3%, Purified Water q.s.

Blend of following natural essential oils:

  • Camphor 10%
  • Thymol 5%
  • Eucalyptus Oil 40%
  • Menthol 15%
  • Pine Oil 30%

settings.heading: GENERAL INFORMATION
settings.text:
COMPOSITION: Oxymetazoline Hydrochloride

INDICATIONS: : COLDLYTE OXY relieves blocked nose and nasal congestion due to common cold, sinusitis, hay fever or other allergic conditions.

BENEFITS:
It shows instant action on a blocked nose. It starts to unblock the nose in 25 seconds. It reduces the inflammation in the blood vessels and excess nasal secretions, thereby improving breathing.

THERAPEUTIC CLASS: Respiratory

ADDICTIVE OR HABIT FORMING: No

CATEGORY: Antihistamine (anti-allergic)

settings.heading: Benefits
settings.text:
1. SYNERGISTIC ACTION: Combining the benefits of Breathe Blend, Vapor Patch and Breathofy, the sinus wellness pack provide a long-term solution to your existing sinusitis.
  2. INSTANT RELIEF: Bibo Sinus wellness pack gives you instant relief. With Breathe Blend, Vapor Patch and Nasal Spray, you will immediately experience the benefits of essential oils and other herbs which ensure free and clear breathing.
  3. WHOLESOME RELIEF: Sinusitis often comes with allergies and moments of difficult breathing. With the Bibo Sinus wellness pack get freedom from stubborn nasal blockage or congestion in the nose.
  4. IMMUNITY BUILDERS: It not only gives symptomatic relief but also builds immunity against future infections.
  5. IT IS DIFFERENT FROM OTHERS: Our products are safe for your kids and are pocket friendly too.

settings.heading: Safety Precautions
settings.text:
1. Breathe Blend is suitable for kids above the age of 5. For younger kids, it can be used only under the supervision of adults.
  2. Seek medical advice if pregnant or lactating before using Breathe Blend.
  3. Avoid contact with eyes and wash with water if came in touch.
  4. Keep out of children's reach.
  5. Vapor Patch is only for EXTERNAL use, do not taste or swallow.
  6. Read the label carefully before use.
  7. Store in a cool and dry place away from direct sunlight.
  8. These are Ayurvedic proprietary medicines and are generally considered safe.
  9. If you face any adverse symptoms or develop any allergy to the products, please discontinue and see a doctor.
  10. Saline Nasal Spray is for nasal use only.
  11. For Breathofy Syrup, finish or discard the product within 6 weeks of opening the bottle.

settings.heading: Dosage
settings.text:
Clear Vapor Patch Ultra

  1. Use up to 2 patches per day for kids and up to 3 patches for adults.
  2. Feel free in applying over clothes, it leaves no stains.
  3. Use the patch immediately after tearing the pouch. It’s a single-use patch.

Breathe Blend

  1. Use one to two drops on a hanky or pillow for inhalation.
  2. Or add one to two drops for steam inhalation in water or the oils diffuser.
  3. Can also add a drop to the vapor patch for extending efficacy further.
  4. Euro dropper: Just tilt the bottle to get drops. Keep it sealed all the time.

Saline Nasal Spray

  1. Spray in each nostril up to 3 times daily for kids aged between 3 years and 10 years.
  2. For 11 years and onwards, use up to 2 sprays in each nostril up to 4 times a day.
  3. Maintenance Dose: Daily twice, one spray in each nostril.
  4. When using the spray, good to breathe in with nose and breathe out with mouth.
  5. Keep the tip clean, wipe with clean cloth or tissues after use.
  6. Avoid mixing up with others by writing your name with a marker.

Breathofy Syrup

  1. Dosage for boosting lung health in conditions like asthma, bronchitis, and smoker's lungs: 5ml twice a day regularly.
  2. Shake well before use. For best outcomes, take at least 30 minutes before or after meals and avoid having water after taking it.

settings.question: What are the indications of Bibo Saline Nasal Spray?
settings.answer: Bibo Saline Nasal Spray relieves common cold, blocked or runny nose, nasal congestion, sore throat and sinusitis. It relieves symptoms in people suffering from allergies, deviated nasal septum and nasal polyps.Add about ten sprays to a glass of water and use it as a gargle.Add 5ml of Bibo Saline Nasal Spray to sterilized water, and you can use it for Neti kriya. The Neti kriya can give instant relief to people having sinusitis.

settings.question: How is Bibo Saline Nasal Spray different from other Nasal Sprays?
settings.answer: Bibo Saline Nasal Spray is not an ordinary spray. It is enriched with Tulsi and Xylitol. Bibo Saline Nasal Spray has antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and immune-building properties. It is safe for all age groups and can also be used as a gargle and a solution for Neti kriya.

settings.question: Will Bibo Saline Nasal Spray cause nose bleeding or irritation?
settings.answer: No, Bibo Saline Nasal Spray will not cause nose bleeding or irritation when properly used. Use the spray up to 4-5 times a day.

settings.question: Is Bibo Saline Nasal Spray safe for kids?
settings.answer: Yes, Bibo Saline Nasal Spray is safe for all age groups. It contains a saline solution with antimicrobial, anti-inflammatory, and immune-building herb Tulsi and Xylitol.

settings.question: Is Bibo Saline Nasal Spray addictive?
settings.answer: Bibo Saline Nasal Spray is non-addictive. It doesn’t contain any chemical that may be habit-forming.

settings.heading: We Promise You Easy Breathing!
settings.text: Our products are specially curated for a healthy respiratory care regime!
